description: A micro-lesson that makes Fossils: Snapshots of the Past usable.

hook.text: Fossils show us creatures that lived and died millions of years before humans existed.

buildup.text: When organisms die in sediment, minerals slowly replace their bones, preserving the shape.

discovery.text: Deeper rock layers contain older, simpler fossils. Newer layers show more complex ones.
